name: Fruit Revels
description:
Fruit Revels is a unique match-3 game!
Make a cup of fresh fruit juice with lush fruits and candies! Join us on this delicious puzzle adventure and try to take on over 100 addictive fun-filled levels!

Fruit Revels features:
- Juice blast saga effects!
- Dainty fruits and colorful graphics!
- Unique power-ups and combos in each levels.
- Friendly and fascinating characters.
- Hundreds of well-designed free levels! More free levels will coming soon!
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
- Highly addictive gameplay.

Fruit Revels is completely free to play!
